title: statcalc
text: basic example shows perform geometric mean:
code: library(statcalc) ## basic example code vector <- c(3, 62, 73, 920, 482, 810, 58, 382, 227, 82, 38, 517) geomean(vector) #> [1] "Geometric mean = 135.85   95% CI = 53.61, 344.28"
